nodes.text: A human male served as a rebel trooper during the Imperial Era and took part in a battle. During the fighting, the trooper proclaimed to his comrades about Red Four, who had sacrificed herself to unsuccessfully try to kill Darth Vader. The trooper then expressed shock as Vader emerged from the wreckage.
The trooper appears in the 2019 special comic "Red Four", written by Charles Soule with art by Terry Dodson.
